GlobalCommands.Name: utc
GlobalCommands.Description: Returns the time with UTC offset. If you don't enter anything, it will display UTC +00:00 time.

Options.Name: offset
Options.Description: The UTC offset in range [-12 to +14]

GuildsCommands.Name: help
GuildsCommands.Description: Displays information about all bot commands.

GuildsCommands.Name: utc
GuildsCommands.Description: Returns the time with UTC offset. If you don't enter anything, it will display UTC +00:00 time.

Options.Name: offset
Options.Description: The UTC offset in range [-12 to +14]

GuildsCommands.Name: user
GuildsCommands.Description: Returns info about the user who used this command

Options.Name: user
Options.Description: The user to get info from
